description: Free-climbing technical shoes for cracks, big-walls and Yosemite-scale outings. Co-developed by Tommy Caldwell, as a high-end powerful shoe, the mid-height cut protects your ankles and strategically placed foam helps make long splitters endurable if not comfortable.Uppers are leather for fit and durability. Vibram® rubber rands provide good friction in cracks.Synthetic lined uppers, (unlined under the foot for comfort and sensitivity). PU foam protects your feet while jamming.Airmesh tongues for breathability.P3 tensioning system directs power over the toes and forefoot.Slip-lasted construction with a 1.1mm Laspoflex midsole for stiffness and power when edging.Outsoles are Vibram® XS Edge™ rubber which is more durable and edges better than XS Grip™ rubber.La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size.
name: La Sportiva TC Pro Rock Shoes - Unisex
